name: list_transactions
description: List and filter transactions. Supports filtering by month, category, user, account, and free-text search. Returns paginated results.

month.description: Filter by month in YYYY-MM format (e.g. '2026-02').

account_id.description: Filter by account ID (matches either from_account_id or to_account_id).

search.description: Free-text search across description, merchant, and note fields.

offset.description: Number of results to skip (default 0, for pagination).
